key_risks: Financial health and profitability concerns due to high operating expenses and reliance on subscription-based revenue
Competitive pressures from established players like Microsoft Teams, Atlassian, and Monday.com
Customer concentration risk with significant revenue from larger enterprise clients
Data privacy and security risks as a cloud-based platform
controversies: Investigation by law firms for potential breaches of fiduciary duties by directors and officers
Shareholder concerns over governance and potential securities law violations
governance_issues: Potential breaches of fiduciary duties by directors and officers
Shareholder concerns over governance and potential securities law violations
